name: Red bracelets of fire
data: It decreases the users strength poorly.
It decreases the users constitution a tiny bit.
It increases the users intelligence adequately.
It has poor armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration adequately.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives small bonus to the spell 'fire preference'.
A mystical voice fills your mind 'Question us and thou shall get an
answer from us, the spirits inside these bracelets.'
